original_text:
For by me your days will be multiplied,
    and years will be added to your life.
korean_text: 나 지혜로 말미암아 네 날이 많아질 것이요 네 생명의 해가 네게 더하리라

sentences.original_text: For by me your days will be multiplied,
sentences.korean_translation: 나로 말미암아 네 날이 많아질 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and years will be added to your life.
